name: Vaadin.RadioGroupElement

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: The current disabled state of the radio group. True if group and all internal radio buttons are disabled.

description:
`<vaadin-radio-group>` is a Polymer element for grouping vaadin-radio-buttons.

```html
<vaadin-radio-group>
  <vaadin-radio-button name="foo">Foo</vaadin-radio-button>
  <vaadin-radio-button name="bar">Bar</vaadin-radio-button>
  <vaadin-radio-button name="baz">Baz</vaadin-radio-button>
</vaadin-radio-group>
```

### Styling

[Generic styling/theming documentation](https://cdn.vaadin.com/vaadin-valo-theme/0.3.1/demo/customization.html)

The following state attributes are available for styling:

Attribute  | Description | Part name
-----------|-------------|------------
`disabled`   | Set when the radio group and its children are disabled. | :host
